pageContext.description: A complete cast copper alloy bead dating from the Bronze age to the Early Medieval period. The bead is sub-biconical in form with a slightly flattened top and bottom. In section the bead is plano-covex with a large internal perforation, and the object demonstrates an even greenish brown patina. The external diameter of the bead is 14.42mm, the internal diameter is 6.22mm and th maximum thickness is 5.51mm. The object weighs 2.88 grammes.
pageContext.notes: Copper-alloy biconical beads are difficult to date without a secure stratified context, and thus a wide date range has been suggested.
